title: Repair Composite Delamination
description: A technician has found a delamination (a separation of layers) in a composite control surface. It must be repaired.

tasks.description: Map the exact size and shape of the delamination using an ultrasonic inspection tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately maps the boundaries of the damage.

tasks.description: Follow the SRM to carefully remove the damaged material.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent removes all damaged composite layers.

tasks.description: Apply new composite patches, layer by layer, and cure the repair using a heating blanket under vacuum pressure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully performs the bonded composite repair.
